info.official_title: A Nationwide Multicenter, Ambispective Real-world Study of Pyrotinib Combined With Capecitabine in Patients With HER-2 Positive Advanced Breast Cancer and Brain Metastases (Post-PERMEATE)

inclusion_lines.line: 1. Pathologically diagnosed patients with HER-2 expression-positive advanced breast cancer; Note: Positive HER2 expression refers to at least one tumor cell immunohistochemical staining intensity of 3+ or fluorescence in situ hybridization [FISH] in the pathological detection/recheck of the primary or metastatic lesions performed by the pathology department of the participating central hospital confirmed positive;

criterions.exact_snippets: Pathologically diagnosed patients
HER-2 expression-positive advanced breast cancer
HER2 expression refers to at least one tumor cell immunohistochemical staining intensity of 3+
fluorescence in situ hybridization [FISH] in the pathological detection/recheck of the primary or metastatic lesions

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Brain metastases are diagnosed by MRI/enhanced CT imaging, according to RECIST 1.1 criteria, with or without measurable lesions and with or without symptoms of brain metastases;

criterions.exact_snippets: Brain metastases are diagnosed by MRI/enhanced CT imaging
according to RECIST 1.1 criteria
with or without measurable lesions
with or without symptoms of brain metastases

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Pyrotinib combined with capecitabine in the treatment of brain metastases with non-PD evaluation at the first treatment, at least ≥ 2 continuous imaging reports or assessments

criterions.exact_snippets: brain metastases
non-PD evaluation at the first treatment
criterions.criterion: non-PD evaluation at the first treatment

criterions.exact_snippets: at least ≥ 2 continuous imaging reports or assessments

inclusion_lines.line: 4. For previous treatment regimens, no previous use of capecitabine or progression after capecitabine discontinuation for 6 months, or progression after discontinuation of capecitabine adjuvant therapy for one year or more;

criterions.exact_snippets: no previous use of capecitabine
progression after capecitabine discontinuation for 6 months
progression after discontinuation of capecitabine adjuvant therapy for one year or more
criterions.criterion: progression after discontinuation of capecitabine adjuvant therapy

inclusion_lines.line: 5. There are traceable medical history data.

criterions.exact_snippets: traceable medical history data
Healthy volunteers allowed

exclusion_lines.line: 1. Patients enrolled in the previous PERMEATE study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients enrolled in the previous PERMEATE study

exclusion_lines.line: 2. The research program is receiving other anti-tumor drug treatment at the same time;

criterions.exact_snippets: receiving other anti-tumor drug treatment

exclusion_lines.line: 3. The initial dose of pyrotinib is lower than the minimum dose in the instructions (240 mg), and the capecitabine is 50% lower than the standard dose;

criterions.exact_snippets: The initial dose of pyrotinib is lower than the minimum dose in the instructions (240 mg)
the capecitabine is 50% lower than the standard dose

exclusion_lines.line: 4. Pyrotinib combined with capecitabine in the treatment of non-brain metastases and progressive patients;

criterions.exact_snippets: Pyrotinib combined with capecitabine
non-brain metastases
progressive patients

exclusion_lines.line: 5. The investigator believes that the patient is not suitable to enter this study.

criterions.exact_snippets: The investigator believes that the patient is not suitable to enter this study.
